/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Trees and power lines add a touch of nature and modernity to the urban landscape. Cars and people can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly muted, creating a calm and serene atmosphere.
